segments.text: I'm not feeling well . I'm very nervous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take it easy . We are going to have our own baby . You should be happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The doctors and the nurses will help you . And I will be waiting for you right here , praying for you and our baby .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , dear . I feel better now .
segments.speaker: S2
